title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a REST API and CLI.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, offering async/sync APIs and streaming support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama) to use Ollama models as LLM/chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Self-hosted ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to local Ollama instances via OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming, and image support; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with ergonomic commands and config profiles.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models; dark mode & markdown rendering.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration package (ollama-haystack) to use local Ollama generators in pipelines.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with async and streaming support; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels using slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider + Facade wrapping the Ollama REST API for PHP projects.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official .NET SDK for Ollama on NuGet with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs for Go, Rust, Swift, and more maintained by Ollama team.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated Modelfiles for popular LLMs (Llama3, Phi-3, Mistral) with example prompts and quantization notes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app showing retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama server pre-installed.
